user_action_and_explanation: type "solitude" into the search bar with placeholder "Search English—Chinese (Traditional)" to look up the word's meaning, pronunciation, and example sentence.
observation: The user successfully found the entry for the word "solitude" on the Cambridge Dictionary website. The meaning is provided under a title, indicating it as a noun with the definition "the situation of being alone without other people". Additionally, the UK and US pronunciations are displayed as /ˈsɒl.ɪ.tjuːd/ and /ˈsɑː.lə.tuːd/ respectively, along with audio icons for each pronunciation. Example sentences are provided: "After months of solitude at sea it felt strange to be in company" and "It provides one with a chance to reflect on spiritual matters in solitude". Further examples can be found in the EXAMPLES section below the main definition.
